key_talking_points: Sam Bennett scores for Florida! Assisted by Anton Lundell and Brandon Montour, Bennett puts the Panthers ahead 1-0 early in the first period. The goal came at 2:07 with 17:53 remaining.
The goal occurred on the power play, increasing the urgency for Edmonton to respond, as Florida takes an early lead.
Following the goal, the Oilers and Panthers exchanged hits in the offensive zone and along the boards. Expecting a more physical game as Edmonton looks to equalize.
for_commentary_agent.context: Focus on the Panthers taking an early lead and the increased physicality after the goal.

high_intensity_events.summary: Sam Bennett (FLA) Goal at 02:07 of Period 1, assisted by Anton Lundell and Brandon Montour.

task_details.specific_guidance: Emphasize the impact of the early power play goal and the resulting momentum shift.
